scripts.build:contract: cd contracts/ && rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown && cargo build --workspace --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release && cd ../
scripts.build: npm run build:contract && npm run build:frontend
scripts.dev:deploy:contract: npm run build && cd contracts && near dev-deploy --wasmFile res/steady_study_token.wasm --initFunction new_default_meta --initArgs '{"owner_id": "efgriver.testnet", "total_supply": "10000000"}' && cd ../
scripts.dev: npm run dev:deploy:contract && npm run dev:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:contract && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:integration: npm run test:integration:rs && npm run test:integration:ts
scripts.test:integration:rs: npm run build:contract && npm run postbuild:contract && cd contracts/integration-tests/rs && cargo run --example integration-tests
scripts.deploy:serverless:test: cp serverless.test.yml serverless.yml && npx serverless@2.72.2 && rm -rf serverless.yml
